Dear All,
          I'm currently trying to use JUnit to test a series of EJB methods.
When I run the tests I get the following message:

*	junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: Exception in constructor:
testIJBCHome (java.lang.LinkageError: loader constraints violated when
linking com/eds/ijb/data/IJBCriteria class 

The basic error is the LinkageError. Has anybody come across this type of
error and if so how do I go about fixing it?

Thanks in advance.

Angus
subject: junit.framework.AssertionFailedError
